summary: Adds underground player \"home\" to sea north, northeast of Solitude Lighthouse.
descriptionHtml:
North, northeast of Solitude Lighthouse stands an ice mound covering an unexplored Dwemer ruin. Player home with crafting storage, ingredient storage, full crafting facilities, Greenhouse, player bed, manikins for display, weapons racks, bookcases, and much more. 

To do: 
  Much set dressing for lived in feel.
  Quest related to clearing ruins for personal use.
  Mining tunnels for use by player.
  Connect tunnels to Blackreach.
  Other ideas as they come to me.

Entered earlier version on Skyrim Real Estate. Check out their other mods as well.

Requires latest version of Skyrim.

7/20/12 - Now updated to version .6
8/24/12 - Despite what the file says, this is version .65 (not .45) Added wine cellar and fixed some Nav issues.
11/9/12 - Now requires Dawnguard. Genuine Falmer Blood Elixir grants vampire feeding perk. Added plants from Dawnguard and much misc. Changes to Aviary and Barracks. Crafting storage still safe.

If you like, please endorse.

Please leave feedback.


Recommended:

 UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul 14037
 My Home Is Your Home 18045
author: Riley Evan
